alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Stanton; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 30 at 7:52PM CDT until May 01 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM CDT MONDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. * WHERE...Cedar, Wayne and Stanton Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 8 AM CDT Monday. For the Wind Advisory, until 8 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
